column5: was fishing a local canal today and was face to face with hundreds of panfish. Dropped minnows-no takers. Then I dangled juicy worms millimeters from their mouths-no dice either.Never seen this before. Weird.
bring some maggots with ya .. pannies never say no

in that case you need to down size your line, bait and keep switching it up until they hit....try using tiny jigs with a small profile white/pink/chartreuse plastic grub or if that doesn't work usually tiny flies work well....and if that still doesn't cut it then move up in size and use small crankbaits,spinners......
